parameters.label: To (phone number)
parameters.help_text: A phone number that will receive the SMS. Format is +15551234567

parameters.label: From (phone number)
parameters.help_text: All SMS alerts will be from this phone number. Format is +15551234567

parameters.label: Twilio Account SID
parameters.help_text: The "Twilio Account SID" - get this from your Twilio account

parameters.label: Twilio Auth Token
parameters.help_text: The "Twilio Auth Token" - get this from your Twilio account

parameters.label: Additional Message Data
parameters.help_text: Additional text that will be appended to the SMS
